Their composition Iuu heuggesleda S follows: (A) Shri B.S, Singla, (Head) Shri Mahabir Singh Shri V.K. Sharma (B) Shri S.C. Jindal,; (Head) Shri K. Venkataramana Shri R.K. Bansal 2. The distribution of cases pending settlement, to be dealt by the above mentioned two Committees are placed at Annexure-A and Annexure-B respectively. 3, This has the approval of the Chairman: (P C Grover ) CGM(Legal/HR&A) (1) Shri B.S.
